alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued November 16 at 3:33AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Partly cloudy skies are expected today. Highs will range from the mid 40s over northwest South Dakota to the mid 60s over south-central South Dakota. Minimum relative humidities will range from the 40s over northwest South Dakota to the mid 20s to mid 30s over southern South Dakota. Behind a strong cold front, northwest winds will increase to 25-40 mph with gusts to 45-55 mph at times. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Friday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the high category.
